SELECT * FROM (SELECT e.event_idx , e.event_title , e.event_startDt , e.event_endDt , e.event_poster , e.event_thumbnail , e.event_category , ec.eventCate_Subject , RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY event_category ORDER BY event_startDt, event_idx DESC) as rk FROM event e JOIN eventCate ec ON e.event_category = ec.eventCate_Idx ORDER BY ec.eventCate_Idx) A WHERE rk <= 3
